title: 15 14 15 "The Purr-fect plan""Beat Kuro! Usopp the Man's Tearful Resolve!"Transliteration: "Kuro o Taose! Otoko Usoppu Namida no Ketsui!" (Japanese:クロを倒せ!男ウソップ涙の決意!) Kōnosuke Uda Junki Takegami 614.4 February 23, 2000(2000-02-23)[29] December 18, 2004[30]
transformers_text:
15 14 15 "The Purr-fect plan""Beat Kuro! Usopp the Man's Tearful Resolve!"Transliteration: "Kuro o Taose! Otoko Usoppu Namida no Ketsui!" (Japanese:クロを倒せ!男ウソップ涙の決意!) Kōnosuke Uda Junki Takegami 614.4 February 23, 2000(2000-02-23)[29] December 18, 2004[30]

Siam and Buchie (of the Meowban Brothers) face off once again against Zoro, as Luffy and Kuro begin their fight. Usopp orders the Usopp Pirates to run away with Kaya and keep her safe, but Jango goes after them, and Zoro goes after both while carrying Usopp in order to find the way. A flashback reveals that Captain Kuro faked his death by hypnotizing one of his men into claiming to be him, and hypnotizing Captain Morgan to think that he caught him, before becoming Kaya's butler.
